dict.string: we request access to bluetooth so that user can send it to us and we can assist them as they request bluetooth
we request access to bluetooth so that user can send it to us and we can assist them as they request bluetooth

we need permission to access your camera, to use the QR code scanning feature. This permission is necessary for the app to function properly and will only be used for scanning QR codes. We take your privacy seriously and will not access your camera for any other purposes
we request access to location so that user can send it to us and we can assist them as they request location
we request access to location so that user can send it to us and we can assist them as they request location
we request access to location so that user can send it to us and we can assist them as they request location
we request access to microphone so that user can send it to us and we can assist them as they request microphone

we need permission to access your photo library, to upload a profile picture. This permission is necessary for the app to change user profile picture. We take your privacy seriously and will not access your photo library for any other purposes

we need permission to access your photo library, to upload a profile picture. This permission is necessary for the app to change user profile picture. We take your privacy seriously and will not access your photo library for any other purposes
